text:
Bow Church is a Docklands Light Railway (DLR) station in Bow in London, England, between Devons Road and Pudding Mill Lane stations. It is within 300 metres walking distance of Bow Road station on London Underground's District and Hammersmith and City lines. The two Bow stations are classed as a single station for ticketing purposes. The station opened on 31 August 1987. It takes its name from the nearby 14th century Bow Church, which is a Church of England church.
